short_summary: Cavendish Campground Washroom Facility upgrade, PEI National Park
description: The contract is to furnish, install, test, and validate the Cavendish Campground Washroom Facility improvement projects as per Canada Parks official plans and specifications. Total value estimated $250,001 - $500,000. Total scope includes timelines and requirements as outlined in the terms. Omnibus contracts may be appropriate for this construction project. Timeframe of contract: June 8, 2023 to June 17, 2023.
full_summary:
Cavendish Campground Washroom Facility Upgrade, Prince Edward Island National Park.
Solicitation Number: 5P468-22-0035B
**Issue Date:** November 17, 2022
**Closing Date and Time:** December 13, 2022, 1:00 PM EST
**Amendment Date:** December 5, 2022

## Tender Information
Contracting Entity:
Parks Canada
Contracting Entity Address:
30 Victoria Street
Gatineau, Quebec
J8X 0B3
Canada

## Tender Description
The project involves constructing a washroom facility in the new Cavendish campground expansion within the Prince Edward Island National Park. The successful contractor shall provide all necessary materials and labour to complete the project according to the provided plans and specifications.

**Estimated Project Value:** $250,001 to $500,000 (Excluding Taxes)
**Expected Contract Duration:** June 15, 2023

**Introduction**
This solicitation cancels and supersedes the previous bid solicitation, number 5P468-22-0035/A, dated June 8, 2022.

**Modalities of Bid Submission**
Bids will be accepted via email only. The only acceptable email address for bid responses is [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca). The maximum email file size that Parks Canada can receive is 15 megabytes.

**Security Measure**
No security measure is required for this bid solicitation.

**Optional Site Visit**
Contractors are encouraged to visit the project site prior to submitting a bid. The site visit will take place at 355 Graham’s Ln, New Glasgow, PEI, C0A 1N0 on November 28, 2022, at 9:00 a.m. local time. Proper personal protective equipment must be worn during the visit.

**Enquiry Procedure**
Technical and contractual queries shall be directed to the Contracting Authority. Enquiries must be submitted in writing and shall be received no later than five (5) business days prior to the closing date.

**Trade Agreements**
This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Attachments**
Bid documents and addenda are available at [www.CanadaGC.Buyandsell.gc.ca](http://www.CanadaGC.Buyandsell.gc.ca).
